title: IStreamPlanet
text:
iStreamPlanet is a <a href="Seattle">Seattle, Washington</a>-based company which processes and delivers live <a href="video">video</a> broadcasts over the <a href="internet">internet</a>. iStreamPlanet was acquired by <a href="Turner%20Broadcasting%20System">Turner Broadcasting</a> in 2015 and is currently operated by <a href="WarnerMedia">WarnerMedia</a>. The company was founded in 2000 by former <a href="basketball">basketball</a> player Mio Babic.
iStreamPlanet has streamed a number of major sporting events, including the <a href="NCAA%20Division%20I%20Men%27s%20Basketball%20Tournament">2017 and 2018 NCAA March Madness Tournaments</a>, <a href="Olympics">every Olympics since 2010</a>, the <a href="Super%20Bowl">Super Bowl</a>, the <a href="FIFA%20World%20Cup">FIFA World Cup</a>, and <a href="Formula%20One">Formula One auto racing.</a>
Customers.
